alert.note: Alert for Natrona (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 27 at 4:01PM MDT until August 27 at 4:45PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Riverton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Natrona County in central Wyoming... * Until 445 PM MDT. * At 400 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Evansville, which is also near Casper, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...A 65 mph gust was recorded at Casper Airport. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over areas of east central Natrona County, including the following locations... Edness K Wilkins State Park, Casper Mountain, Casper Events Center, Casper Mountain County Park, Rotary Park, Casper Natural Gas Processing Plant and Central Wyoming Fairgrounds. This includes Interstate 25 between mile markers 176 and 199. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
